skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: indiana hypnosis
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Learn more about hypnosis from Indiana Hypnosis Center. This skill provides information about Indiana Hypnosis on how hypnosis works, hypnotherapy sessions, if hypnosis can help with a chronic condition, and more.

Angie J. Hernandez is a Certified Hypnotherapist specializing in helping clients with smoking cessation, weight loss, chronic conditions, and hypnosis for kids. Her degree from HMI in Tarzana, California, and she is published in Hypnotic Women on Amazon, and author of Weight Loss Epiphany on Amazon.

Learn more at http://indianahypnosis.net

To start this skill say:
Alexa, launch Indiana Hypnosis.

Questions you can ask while in this skill:
How does hypnosis work?
What is your hypnosis specialty?
What happens when I come in for a session?
Can hypnosis help with a chronic condition?
How does hypnosis for kids work?

This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
